result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph Q Curd was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Court will waive all costs, fines, and/or surcharges due to financial instability.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Q Curd

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Letters in Support of Joseph Q Curd, received and filed.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  On state's motion, Court ordered charge AMENDED to Disorderly Conduct, Co. Ord. 63.01 to which defendant pled guilty. Court will waive all costs, fines and or surcharges due to financial instability.

Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until 1/6/2016.  Status conference scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for calendar call/projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record,     Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance to continue to next scheduled hearing.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea and sentencing. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until 12/7/2015.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Calendar call scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for plea hearing.
For reasons stated on the record, court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for projected guilty plea. Defendant waiting for DPA.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea/DPA in Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Scheduling conference held off the record. Defendant will be referred for possible DPA. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services "Court Reminders."  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  
Defendant to have no contact with: SYVELL H. OR JESSIE G.  DEFENDANT IS ALLOWED NON-VIOLENT CONTACT WITH THE TWO NAMES INDIVIDUALS FOR THE LIMITED PURPOSE OF COURT HEARINGS, EDUCATIONAL HEARINGS AND ADMINISTRATIVE SCHOOL HEARINGS.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Joan E. Zawikowski.  Defendant Joseph Q Curd in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  

Scheduling conference scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Joseph Q Curd
Current: 3306 N Richards Street, Milwaukee, WI   (Effective: 08-16-2015)
Prior: 3359 N 25th St, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond)
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Mark Allan Dluzak in court prior to case being called.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea.   Defendant failing to appear, Defendant contacted the Court and referred to contact his attorney. Court ordered Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. Defendant states he has a family emergency.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Court is in jury trial for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 7, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Pre-trial conference held off the record.   Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with SYVELL H. OR JESSIE G.  DEFENDANT IS ALLOWED NON-VIOLENT CONTACT WITH THE TWO NAMES INDIVIDUALS FOR THE LIMITED PURPOSE OF COURT HEARINGS, EDUCATIONAL HEARINGS AND ADMINISTRATIVE SCHOOL HEARINGS.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Joseph Q Curd in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Defendant Joseph Q Curd in custody.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
